fooddata.name: Pizza
fooddata.description: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a such as tomato sauce, cheese, and vegetables.

fooddata.name: Margherita
fooddata.description: Margherita is a classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

fooddata.name: Pasta
fooddata.description: Pasta is a staple food of Italian cuisine made from durum wheat and typically served with various sauces.

fooddata.name: Burger
fooddata.description: A classic American dish consisting of a grilled or fried patty made from ground beef, served in a bun and typically topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments.

fooddata.name: Sushi
fooddata.description: A Japanese delicacy consisting of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients such as raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and sometimes tropical fruits.

fooddata.name: Tacos
fooddata.description: Traditional Mexican dish made of a tortilla filled with various ingredients, such as seasoned meat, beans, cheese, lettuce, and salsa.

fooddata.name: Pasta Carbonara
fooddata.description: An Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti or other long pasta, eggs, cheese (typically Pecorino Romano), pancetta (or bacon), and black pepper.

fooddata.name: Steak
fooddata.description: A prime cut of beef, usually grilled or pan-seared and served with various side dishes like mashed potatoes, vegetables, or a salad.

fooddata.name: Sushi Burrito
fooddata.description: A fusion of sushi and burrito, it features a large rolled sushi wrapped in a seaweed sheet and filled with sushi rice, raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and sauces.

fooddata.name: Chicken Curry
fooddata.description: A flavorful dish made with chicken, aromatic spices, and a rich curry sauce, often served with rice or naan bread.
